array.string: /usr/sbin/diskutil apfs deleteVolume $(/usr/sbin/diskutil list | /usr/bin/grep 'Nix Store' | /usr/bin/sed -e 's/.*\(disk.*\)/\1/');/bin/launchctl disable system/org.nixos.removenixvol && /usr/libexec/PlistBuddy -c 'Delete :org.nixos.removenixvol' /var/db/com.apple.xpc.launchd/disabled.plist && /bin/rm -f /Library/LaunchDaemons/org.nixos.removenixvol.plist
